prompt:
KYC VALIDATION

Create: modules/betting-platform/backend/services/KYCService.ts

Basic KYC check:
1. checkKYCStatus(userId)
   - Return {verified, level, reason}
   - Levels: none, basic, full

2. requireKYC(level)
   - Middleware factory
   - Check user KYC >= level
   - 403 if insufficient

Simple status check.
